==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=老而不死是为贼}}

===Etymology===
From the ''[[w:Analects of Confucius|Analects of Confucius]]''<br>
Literally: You are old, yet not dead. You are a scoundrel!

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=lǎo ér 不 sǐ shì wéi zéi
|cat=id
}}

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# used to scold an old person who has no regard for others
